MainMenuPanel - Class in panels
The class MainMenuPanel represents the main menu of the Bomberman game.
MainMenuPanel() - Constructor for class panels.MainMenuPanel
This method creates the five different panels available in the main menu of the bomberman game.
mainMenuPanel - Static variable in class system.GameEngine
 
MapObject - Class in system
The class MapObject represents all objects on the map.
MapObject(int, int) - Constructor for class system.MapObject
Sets the map objects position and sets the object to alive.
Moveable - Interface in system
This interface Moveable contains the methods needed to move an object in the Bomberman game.
moveDown() - Method in class system.LivingUnit
This method moves the unit down.
moveDown() - Method in interface system.Moveable
This method moves an object down.
moveEnemies() - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method runs through the enemies arry using a for loop and moves them randomly It also kills the player if the enemy moves into the player
moveLeft() - Method in class system.LivingUnit
This method moves the unit left.
moveLeft() - Method in interface system.Moveable
This method moves an object left.
moveRandom(LivingUnit) - Method in class system.GamePhysics
This method moves an enemy randomly according to a random number generator with a 2/5 chance to not move at all and a 3/5 chance to move either up,down,left or right.
moveRight() - Method in class system.LivingUnit
This method moves the unit right.
moveRight() - Method in interface system.Moveable
This method moves an object right.
moveUp() - Method in class system.LivingUnit
This method moves the unit up.
moveUp() - Method in interface system.Moveable
This methods moves an object up.
